issue.title: [Java][CI]: Add support for Java 17 CI process
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16327](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16327). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently Arrow Java code is tenting with JSE11.

This ticket is to planning/mapping activities involved to also offer support JS17
